name: Brutal Brussels Beer Bash - Royale
description:
When a mysterious thunderstorm threatens to flood Brussels under a sub-par foreign beer, prince Laurent sets out to use his newly learned Kung-Fu skills to save the city.

This game was made during the Big Game Jam at Point Culture in Brussels, where the theme was "B-Movies in Brussels".

The team was made up of Bastien Gorissen, Noemie Scherer, Thomas Stassin and Thomas Van Bouwel
